body.p: supports syntax highlighting in XSLT documents to improve the readability of the content and reduce the time it takes to internalize the semantics of the structured content.

To customize the colors or styles used for the syntax highlighting colors for XSLT files, follow these steps:
.
Go to Editor Syntax Highlight .
Select and expand the XML section in the top pane.
Select the component you want to change and customize the colors or styles using the selectors to the right of the pane.
Select the XSL tab in the Preview pane to see the effects of your changes.
